welcome:
Welcome to BIOMETRIC SIM REGISTRATION (TESTING)
1.New SIM Registration
2.BIO Re-Registration.
3.BIO New Registration.
4.Verify Customer Details
salute: Thank you for your inputs, you will be notified

non_bio_registration.title: Link your phone number with NIA card details
non_bio_registration.2: Enter last Six Digit of ICCID
non_bio_registration.3: Enter the customer's Ghana card number (GHA-XXXXXXXXX-X)
non_bio_registration.7: Enter the customer's date of birth (DDMMYYYY)
non_bio_registration.9: If AirtelTigo Money, enter Next of Kin Full name
non_bio_registration.salute: Thank you for your inputs, you will be notified

bio_re_registration.title: Link your phone number with NIA card details
bio_re_registration.salute: Thank you for your inputs, you will be notified via SMS

bio_registration.title: Link your phone number with NIA card details
bio_registration.2: Enter last Six Digit of ICCID
bio_registration.7: If AirtelTigo Money, enter Next of Kin Full name
bio_registration.salute: Thank you for your inputs, you will be notified via SMS

verify_customer_details.salute: Thank you for your inputs, you will be notified
